name: Feedbooks
description: Feedbooks is a digital library and cloud publishing service for both public domain and original books. The main focus of the web site is providing e-books with particularly high-quality typesetting in multiple formats, particularly EPUB, Kindle, and PDF formats. Custom PDF generation settings, like trim size dimensions and margins, are possible on the site.
